module.name: ImprovedDemo
module.short: The Improved demo demonstrates the new features like fontstyle, color, heading, bookmark and links

element.name: Init
element.short: Initialization-procedure initializes the ODF-Class and the Datapath

element.name: HeadingandStyles
element.short: Generate a chapter of the document with various headings and some styles

element.name: FontsDisplay
element.short: Generate a chapter of the document with a display of all fonts

element.name: StylesBookmarkAndLinks
element.short: Generate a chapter of the document for demonstating bookmarks, links and all styles

element.name: TextColors
element.short: Generate a chapter of the document to display textcolors

element.name: Execute
element.short: Execute the demo. First write the chapters in separate files, then write all chapters in one file.
